flavor: You imbue the weapon with toxic venom.

magic.label: Poison (Magic)
magic.level-4-spells: The weapon can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting} once per day.
magic.level-6-spells: The weapon can cast 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1meVElIu1CEVYWkv]{Noxious Vapors} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting} once per day, but not both.
magic.level-8-spells: The weapon can cast 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1meVElIu1CEVYWkv]{Noxious Vapors}, 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oryfsRK27jAUnziw]{Imp Sting} and 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting} once per day each.
magic.level-12-spells: The weapon can cast 4th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1meVElIu1CEVYWkv]{Noxious Vapors}, 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oryfsRK27jAUnziw]{Imp Sting}, 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LVwmAH5NGvTuuQSU]{Swarming Wasp Stings} once per day each.
magic.level-16-spells: The weapon can cast 6rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1meVElIu1CEVYWkv]{Noxious Vapors}, 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oryfsRK27jAUnziw]{Imp Sting}, 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LVwmAH5NGvTuuQSU]{Swarming Wasp Stings} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ayRXv0wQH00TTNZe]{Purple Worm Sting} once per day each.
magic.level-20-linnorm-sting: The weapon can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZMY58Yk5hnyfeE3q]{Linnorm Sting} once per day.

might.label: Poison (Might)
might.level-8-persistent: On a critical hit, the target takes @Damage[1d10[persistent,poison]] damage.
might.level-12-resistance: The poison damage dealt by this imbued property ignores resistances.
might.level-14-persistent: On a critical hit, the target takes @Damage[2d10[persistent,poison]] damage.
might.level-20-weakness: On a successful Strike with the weapon, before applying poison damage, the target gains weakness 1 to poison until the beginning of your next turn.

tech.label: Poison (Technique)
tech.level-8-persistent: On a critical hit, the target takes an additional @Damage[1d10[persistent,poison]] damage (As normal, the additional persistent poison damage on a critical hit is cumulative with the regular persistent poison damage, and you add it only after doubling the regular persistent poison damage).
tech.level-12-resistance: The poison damage dealt by this imbued property (including persistent poison damage) ignores resistances.
tech.level-16-condition: At the end of a creature's turn, if it has failed to remove the persistent poison damage from this imbued property, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}. The creature gains that condition with a condition value of 1, or increases the condition value by 1 if it already had that condition, to a maximum of 3. If the creature ever removes the persistent poison damage from this property, these conditions immediately end. If you reapply the poison later, you must start again from condition values of 0.
tech.level-20-drained: On a critical hit, the poison eats away at your foe's ability to resist further poisoning. They are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.
